siteDescription: A simple browser extension that applies a dyslexic-friendly font. For some of us, that small change makes reading a lot easier. Free, open-source, no tracking.
heroDescription: A simple browser extension that applies a dyslexic‑friendly font. If reading has ever felt hard, this might help. Free forever :)
feature1Desc: Changes website fonts to Andika, Lexend, Shantell Sans, OpenDyslexic, Atkinson Hyperlegible, or use any custom font available on your system.
feature3Desc: Skip pages where the font change could cause issues.
feature4Desc: Matches your system theme or choose manually.
feature5Desc: Works on Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave, and Firefox for Android.
feature6Desc: Runs with near-zero CPU usage. Stays asleep unless settings change.
feature7Desc: Available in English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian.
fontNote: Some fonts may not support specific languages (e.g., Cyrillic/Greek).
